name: Enhancement
about: Template for improving existing code or feature
title: '[Enhancement]: '
labels: enhancement

---

## Description

What improvement or refactor does this PR introduce?

## Motivation

Why is this enhancement necessary?

## Checklist

- [ ] Improvement adds value or clarity
- [ ] No regressions or side effects
- [ ] Code is readable and maintainable
- [ ] Tests added or updated if necessary
